metadata.name: Redeemable Karma
metadata.description: Gm curious traveler. It's April 18th, 2016. You’ve left the darkness & electric sounds of the Rivers of Steel behind in Chengdu, & you’ve woken up in The Land of the Gods, Lhasa. You’re walking down the road & you peer down a long, strange alley through an open door. You hear a song in the distance calling you in & see a sign that reads Karma 321... Will you have Karma to burn?
